languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Атаки мастера культа накладывает 1 стак Bloodsoaked на врага и 1 стак Bloodsoaked на себя.

languages.text: Совершая успешную атаку, этот культист смерти получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и накладывает на цель +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.

traits.locale_text: Совершая успешную атаку, этот культист смерти получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и накладывает на цель +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}.

Совершая успешную атаку, этот культист смерти получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} и накладывает на цель +1 уровень {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el cultista de la muerte efectúe un ataque con éxito, gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} e inflige +1 acumulación de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} a su objetivo.
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el cultista de la muerte efectúe un ataque con éxito, gana +1 acumulación de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g} e inflige +1 acumulación de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} a su objetivo.

languages.text: この死のカルトの人が攻撃成功するたび、+1スタックの{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を得て、敵に+1スタックの{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.

traits.locale_text: この死のカルトの人が攻撃成功するたび、+1スタックの{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}を得て、敵に+1スタックの{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血まみれ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: 每当这位拜死教教徒命中敌人时，都会获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，同时对目标施加1层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.

traits.locale_text: 每当这位拜死教教徒命中敌人时，都会获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，同时对目标施加1层{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。

languages.text: Macht dieser Todeskultist einen erfolgreichen Angriff, erhält er +1 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} und belegt das Ziel mit +1 Stapel {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.

traits.locale_text: Macht dieser Todeskultist einen erfolgreichen Angriff, erhält er +1 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} und belegt das Ziel mit +1 Stapel {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un cultiste de la mort réussit une attaque, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et inflige +1 cumul de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} à sa cible.
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un cultiste de la mort réussit une attaque, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et inflige +1 cumul de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} à sa cible.

Chaque fois qu'un cultiste de la mort réussit une attaque, il gagne +1 cumul de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} et inflige +1 cumul de {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} à sa cible.

languages.text: Bu ölüm tarikatçısı, başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde +1 {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} birikimi kazanırken hedefte de +1 {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} birikimi oluşturur.
languages.original_text: Whenever this death cultist makes a successful attack, they gain +1 stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} and inflict +1 stack of {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} on their target.
